entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
